SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class clientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.clientController
public class clientController extends Object
It checks the correctness of the input client side. Each client has an instance of the class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    clientController()
    It creates a generic clientController.
    clientController(String nickname)
    It creates a clientController specific for a client given its nickname.

  • Method Details

    • emptyShelf

      public void emptyShelf()
      It empties the local shelf of the player, that is then updated at each turn.

    • checkMessageShape

      public GeneralMessage checkMessageShape(String input)
      Checks if the command called by the client has the right number of parameters and create the message in the JSON format, ready to be sent to the server.
      Parameters:
      input - message to check.
      Returns:
      subclass of general message based on the action type.

    • acceptableOrder

      public boolean acceptableOrder(List<Integer> order)
      It checks if the given order is correct.
      Parameters:
      order - the list of Integer that represent an order.
      Returns:
      true only if the order is acceptable, false otherwise.

    • isStraightLineTiles

      public boolean isStraightLineTiles(List<Position> tiles)
      It checks if the chosen positions are in a straight line.
      Parameters:
      tiles - the list of chosen positions.
      Returns:
      true only if the tiles are in a straight line, false otherwise.

    • isAdjacentOnX

      public boolean isAdjacentOnX(Position a, Position b)
      It checks if two tiles are adjacent horizontally.
      Parameters:
      a - position of the first tile.
      b - position of the second tile.
      Returns:
      true only if the two tiles are adjacent horizontally, false otherwise.

    • isAdjacentOnY

      public boolean isAdjacentOnY(Position a, Position b)
      It checks if two tiles are adjacent vertically.
      Parameters:
      a - position of the first tile.
      b - position of the second tile.
      Returns:
      true only if the two tiles are adjacent vertically, false otherwise.

      It gets the value of firstTurn.

    • setFirstTurn

      public void setFirstTurn(boolean firstTurn)
      It sets the value of firstTurn passed by parameter. It is true only if the turn is the first of the client.
